text: Nandao zhe deng ren hai buru bie de ren ma? Tamen yiju cong tamen de zhu jiang shi de mingzheng, erqie tamen de zhu suo paiqian de jianzheng yi ji na mingzheng er lailin, zai na mingzheng zhiqian hai you mu sa de jingdian, na shi zhenzhu suo jiang ci de zhinan he ci'en. Zhe deng ren shi jianxin na mingzheng de. Ge dangpai zhong shei buxin na mingzheng, huo yu jiang shi shei de yueding di difang. Suoyi nimen buyao huaiyi ta, ta que shi ni de zhu suo jiang shi de zhenli, dan renmen daban buxin.
